DOC.detailed_description: This 16-week , randomize , double-blind , multicenter study compare effect naproxcinod , naproxen , ibuprofen 24 hour arterial blood pressure profile . Patients randomly allocate naproxcinod 375mg , naproxcinod 750mg , naproxen 250mg , naproxen 500mg , ibuprofen 600mg 1:1:1:1:1 ratio .
